virtual MetaInfoTypes idoc::CStandardDocumentMetaInfo::GetSupportedMetaInfoTypes ( bool  allowReadOnly = true) const [virtual]

Get list of supported meta info types.

Parameters:
allowReadOnlyif enabled read only types will be also listed out, if this flag is false only the writable types will be returned.
